title: about us
text: Our newly refurbished BBQ House brings you the finest meat import from around the world.
Our dedicated team of chefs pride themselves on sourcing happy meat which is both tasty and farm friendly.
We don't compromise on quality and nor should you!  Welcome to Holy BBQ!

title: menu
text: Our menu is constantly being updated as our chefs continue to break the BBQ expereince boundaries

title: opening hours
text: The restaurant os opne Monday - Thursday from 11-20 and Friday to Saturday from 12-22.  we are closed Sunday.
For all booking please fill out our booking form and we will get back to you!
